section.heading: Violations of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act.
section.text: The Commissioner or Attorney General for the District of Columbia may bring an action to enjoin or seek remedies for violations of RESPA.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2131 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).
